name: Medium Drawstring Pouch with Geometric Designs and Twisted Fringe
description:
2013
A common use for this item may be as a medicine bag. However, some can call it a small purse. This is a one of a kind piece by Native American Menominee artist Wendy Boivin. 
Geometric design flat beading onto smoked buckskin, stitched together with fringe and lined with muslin. 
Dimensions when flat are height 6.25" x width 4.5" the fringe adds 2.25" in length. 
Materials used are brain-tanned, smoked buckskin, size 13 cut-glass beads and unbleached muslin.
Please allow 1-3 business days for processing. Shipping is by USPS First Class and only to inside United States. Contact for Express Shipping, or different shipping preferences. Refund policy is under review; all sales are final until then. Contact us for more questions!

name: Small Drawstring Pouch with Single Pink and White Flower

2013

Materials used are brain-tanned, smoked buckskin, size 13 cut-glass beads and unbleached muslin.
